sense.def:
The host at a party
je oseba, ki povabi goste na zabavo.

seg.quote: Drinks were being prepared by the host.

sense.def:
Država ali organizacija, ki je
host
, poskrbi za prostore za neko prireditev ali ponudi bivališče osebam iz druge države.

seg.quote: ...the attitude of the host community to the refugees.

sense.def:
The host of a radio or television show
je oseba, ki vodi neko radijsko ali televizijsko oddajo in se pogovarja z ljudmi, ki sodelujejo v njej.

A host of things
je veliko stvari;

seg.quote: ...a host of questions for our experts.
